legalResidency.title: Legal residency status in Albania
legalResidency.description: Live and stay legally in Albania with official residence permit and government recognition

workPermit.title: Work permit eligibility and business opportunities
workPermit.description: Apply for employment permits and establish business ventures in Albania's developing economy

banking.title: Access to Albanian banking and financial services
banking.description: Open bank accounts, apply for loans, and access comprehensive Albanian financial services

healthcare.title: Healthcare and social benefits
healthcare.description: Access Albania's healthcare system and participate in social insurance programs

euProximity.title: EU proximity and travel benefits
euProximity.description: Enjoy Albania's strategic location with easy access to European Union countries and Mediterranean destinations

longTermResidence.title: Path to long-term residence
longTermResidence.description: Qualify for long-term residence options and potential EU integration benefits as Albania progresses toward EU membership
